dataIdInfo.idAbs: This dataset represents mortality (monthly) data for Douglas-fir. Climate condition: Dry. Cover percentage: 50%.
dataIdInfo.idPurp:
VMRC (Vegetation Mortality Risk Calculator) Export Dataset
Map Type: Mortality (Monthly) Species: Douglas-fir Climate Condition: Dry Cover Percentage: 50% Month: 08 HSL Class: mh
This dataset was clipped to a user-defined Area of Interest (AOI) for analysis and visualization.

Consts.useLimit: For research and visualization purposes only.
